comment: Took him fall 2024. I definitely can say he was easy compared to other math classes. I missed the very first exam and another as well, I emailed him a week later when I realized and he reopened the exam until the end of the week. At the end of the semester, he reopens all homework assignments besides exams. Class is self-paced. Emails when needed.

He is very understanding if you aren't that great with math in general and is incredibly lenient. HW and exams were on ALEKS, very straightforward material. Hold yourself accountable and this is an easy A!!!

I took him online and used ALEKS. He does not respond to emails and lies about "dropping grades." He said if we did well on the FCAR exam, we wouldn't have to take the final. He did not do this and we still had to take it. Horrible communicator and is getting paid to do nothing. Horrible.

This professor barely interacted with students all semester; the class felt entirely self-guided. He took months to reply to emails and failed to follow through on promises, like letting those who tested out of the FCAR skip the final. No updates, no communication—just radio silence. It would've been a complete waste of money if I hadn't passed.
Really easy STAT professor. Homework consisted of assignments on Aleks and quizzes on D2L. This course was not very heavy and I would take it again with him.

Professor Long is great and extremely lenient. I took his online course, & we had simple guidelines in the class, you do your homework, tests and quizzes on time. He also gave curves. Everything was on ALEKS, including the final exam.

He was a pretty chill professor. Just do the homework assignments and follow the examples in class and the class won't be hard. The class is easy to pass and most of it is pretty straightforward. Attendance isn't mandatory but I would highly suggest going to class.

Travis does not need to be teaching. He flies through examples, rarely answers his emails. Most days, he is late to class, myself and half the class shows up before he even parks. He constantly brags about how much money he makes and tries to make his students feel small around him. He does NOT care about SDS or if you have a disability. Horrible

Just dont take. Didnt even teach us, the content was given only through videos found online that explains things terrible. Took as online courses. Required lockdown browser + webcam on every test and up to like 3 or 4 Aleks homework assignment per week based on the videos which take a while to do.

Exams and final are all on a lockdown browser with a webcam. Video lectures do not help, neither does the home work. If you think you understand the homework you don't and the quizzes will prove that.

Great Guy! highly recommend. struggled in AP Stats. Now, I have over a 100 average. He explains everything well. Can be a little scatter brained and make little mistakes in class. He always corrects them. He goes over what you need to know for the tests. The quizzes are not hard! I don't know how people fail them. 95 avg  no final!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Professor Long is the funniest professor I've had in my 3 years at KSU. He makes learning easy and makes you do a lot of in-class examples of different problems. So, if you learn by repetition like me, he's your man. The tests are relatively easy and he doesn't try to trick you. He gives take home quizzes but all the tests are in class. 10/10 prof.

He makes a lot of mistakes on in-class notes. Gave 2-3 take home quizzes. Makes quizzes/tests a little tricky. He takes points off for ANY little mistake. Got an A on first quiz, got 60's-70's on all other tests and quizzes but did all of my homework and got a B in class. As long as you do ALL the homework and try your hardest you should do fine
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: first of all this isn't even a real professor! He was a great person BUT THAT'S IT. He does make it easy to pass but that's because he makes his own quizzes and test. WE NEVER USED THE BOOK a waste, he couldn't even help us on the online work!! But He is willing to help you after class and during office hours which i suggest taking advantage of!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: Professor long is a newer professor, but understands the hard work that students put into his class, so he grades very leniently on quizzes and grades. He does take home quizzes, and is very specific in class with his lecture notes. He gives specific examples. Definitely take him, go in with a good attitude and do the homework early every unit!
